title: Create Makefile/Justfile for common tasks
description: Create Makefile or Justfile with commands for: install, test, lint, format, type-check, clean, build, publish-test, publish, docs, and dev setup. Simplify common development workflows.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Created Makefile for common development tasks:

**Installation:**
- install: Install dependencies
- install-dev: Install with dev/docs/security groups

**Testing:**
- test: Run pytest with coverage
- test-fast: Run pytest without coverage

**Code Quality:**
- lint: Run Ruff linting checks
- lint-fix: Run Ruff with auto-fix
- format: Format code with Ruff
- format-check: Check code formatting
- type-check: Run mypy type checking
- quality: Run all quality checks (lint + format-check + type-check)

**Maintenance:**
- clean: Remove build artifacts and caches
- build: Build distribution packages with Poetry
- docs: Build documentation (placeholder)
- pre-commit: Run pre-commit hooks on all files
- update: Update dependencies

**Help:**
- help: Show help message with all available commands

All commands use Poetry for dependency isolation.
